publication.title: A Web Mining Based Measurement and Monitoring Model of Urban Mass Panic in Emergency Management
publication.abstract: Abstract It is very important,to discover the mass,panic when,city is in emergency. A traditional approach,is to do a survey among urban mass, which would cost much time and money. In our opinion, a more suitable and effective approach is to do web- based investigation which includes discovery, measurement, and monitoring. A framework including information retrieval, data mining, and area knowledge
